io.github.struppigel.tools

Class ImpHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.struppigel.tools.ImpHash

  • public class ImpHash
extends java.lang.Object
    Tool to calculate the imphash of a PE file Based on algorithm in https://github.com/erocarrera/pefile/blob/master/pefile.py First mention of imphash in: https://www.fireeye.com/blog/threat-research/2014/01/tracking-malware-import-hashing.html

    Example code: 

     {@code
 File file = new File("WinRar.exe");
 String imphash = ImpHash.createString(file);
 System.out.println(imphash);
